title.en: Estonian for Students of Medicine I, Level 0 - A1.2
title.et: Eesti keel arstiteaduse tudengitele I, tase 0 - A1.2

faculty.address:
Tartu linn, 
Tartu linn, Tartumaa 
EST

name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

structural_unit_name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

description.en:
The Estonian course will give the basic knowledge of the Estonian grammar and vocabulary.
The main topics:
TERE TULEMAST! Welcome!
EESTI JA TARTU. Estonia and Tartu
EESTI KEEL. Estonian language
TEEMA 1. TERE! SAAME TUTTAVAKS! Hello! Let's get acquainted
TEEMA 2. MINA OLEN ... I am ...
TEEMA 3. MINU LEMMIKUD. My favourites
TEEMA 4. POES JA KOHVIKUS. In the shop and in the café
TEEMA 5. MINU PÄEV. My day
TEEMA 6. PERE JA SUGULASED. Family and relatives

The main topics (grammar):
* Cases in singular: basic cases, local cases of singular, comitative and abessive of singular. Nominative plural, genitive Plural
* Personal pronouns, possessive pronouns, adjectives, cardinal numbers;
* Present tense;
* Imperative mood;
* ma- and da-infinitive
description.et:
Eesti keele kursus annab põhiteadmised eesti keele grammatikast ja sõnavarast.
Peamised teemad:
TERE TULEMAST! Welcome!
EESTI JA TARTU. Estonia and Tartu
EESTI KEEL. Estonian language
TEEMA 1. TERE! SAAME TUTTAVAKS! Hello! Let's get acquainted
TEEMA 2. MINA OLEN ... I am ...
TEEMA 3. MINU LEMMIKUD. My favourites
TEEMA 4. POES JA KOHVIKUS. In the shop and in the café
TEEMA 5. MINU PÄEV. My day
TEEMA 6. PERE JA SUGULASED. Family and relatives

Peamised grammatikateemad:
* Käänded ainsuses: põhikäänded, kohakäänded, kaasaütlev ja ilmaütlev; mitmuses: nimetav, omastav
* Isikulised asesõnad, omadussõnad, põhiarvsõnad;
* Olevik
* Käskiv kõneviis
* ma- ja da-infinitiiv

objectives.en: To teach the basics of Estonian grammar and basic vocabulary, start to introduce the special vocabulary of medicine, to practice medical terms in communicative situations and by writing texts, to prepare the students for the main language course Estonian for Students of Medicine. The intended outcome of the course by spring is pre-intermediate level skills in Estonian.
objectives.et: Õpetada eesti keele grammatika aluseid ja eesti keele põhisõnavara. Alustada meditsiinialase sõnavara omandamist, harjutada erialase terminoloogia kasutamist suhtlussituatsioonides ja kirjalikes tekstides, valmistada üliõpilasi ette meditsiinialase eesti keele põhikursuseks. Üldeesmärkide saavutamise lõpptase kevadeks kõigi osaoskuste puhul on A2.

learning_outcomes.en: On completion of the course the attendants will be able
* to understand and use some Estonian cases, conjugate Estonian verbs in the present and past, use the imperative and use adjectives and cardinal numbers.
learning_outcomes.et: *tunneb ja oskab kasutada eesti keele käändeid, pöörata verbe olevikus ja minevikus, kasutada käskivat kõneviisi, kasutada omadussõnu ja põhiarvsõnu.

learning_outcomes.en: * to communicate in easier everyday situations in a shop, at a restaurant or cafe and talk and write about themselves, their family, daily activities and food and drinks and what they like and dislike.
learning_outcomes.et: * suudab suhelda lihtsamates argisituatsioonides poes ja söögikohtades, oskab rääkida ja kirjutada endast, perekonnast, päevast, söökidest-jookidest ning sellest, mis meeldib ja ei meeldi.

learning_outcomes.en: * to understand and create elementary-level oral and written texts.
learning_outcomes.et: * suudab mõista ning luua lihtsamaid suulisi ja kirjalikke tekste.

notes.en:
Be sure to pay attention to the registration cancellation deadline stated in the course outline.

It is necessary to buy the course book at the beginning of the semester and to use the current semester's edition.

If you have any concerns or special needs, please inform the lecturer at the beginning of the semester. You can also reach out to the University of Tartu counselling centre:
https://ut.ee/en/content/psychological-counselling
Special requirements submitted at the end of the semester will not be accepted.

independent_work.et:
Üliõpilane kirjutab semestri jooksul 3 teksti (minimaalselt 100-120 sõna). During the semester  the student writes  3 texts (minimum 100-120 words): 
1) "Mina ja minu lemmikud"
2) "Minu päev" 
3) "Minu pere"
Juhised teksti kirjutamiseks antakse tunnis. Writing instructions will be given in classes.

grade_preconditions.en:
In order to get a positive result at the end of the semester, you need to:
1) participate actively in the course (at least in 25 classes)
2) pass 3 coverage tests 
3) write 3 texts
4) pass oral exam
grade_preconditions.et:
In order to get a positive result at the end of the semester, you need to:
1) participate actively in the course (at least in 25 classes)
2) pass 3 coverage tests 
3) write 3 texts
4) pass oral exam

grade_evaluation.et:
The formation of the final result:
1) 3 written tests (at least 51% each test)
2) 3 texts
4) An oral exam

debt_elimination.et:
Kokkuleppel õppejõuga
In agreement with the teacher

resources.mandatory_materials:
1. Instituudi õppematerjal / study book is obligatory "Eesti keel algajatele" (Koostajad: Piret Toomet, Linda Palts, Katrin Jänese, Sille Midt). You can buy the newest version from your lecturer at the beginning of the course.
2. Tunnis jagatavad käsilehed lisaharjutuste ja -tekstidega. Material and handouts provided in the classes.

name.en: Department of Languages of the Baltic Region

audience.et: Ainult arstiteaduse tudengid / Students of medicine only
